pkgmetadata.longdescription: Monero is a private, secure, untraceable, decentralised digital currency. You are your bank, you control your funds, and nobody can trace your transfers unless you allow them to do so.

use.flag: Install the Monero daemon used to connect to the P2P network.
Install tools used to manipulate the blockchain as it is stored on disk.
Install the command line wallet, monero-wallet-cli.
